max-players.description: Set a maximum length of players that can join.

difficulty.description: Set the difficulty of the game.

online-mode.description: Disallow players with a pirated version of Minecraft to join.

enable-command-block.description: Enable command blocks to operate in the server.

force-gamemode.description: Force players to join on a specific gamemode.

white-list.description: Use a white-list for this server. Note: this can cause players not able to join since they are not mentioned on the white-list.

pvp.description: Use PVP (players versus player) in this server.

allow-nether.description: Allow the server to generate The Nether

view-distance.description: Sets the amount of world data the server sends the client, measured in chunks in each direction of the player (radius, not diameter). It determines the server-side viewing distance. 10 is the default/recommended. If the player has major lag, this value is recommended to be reduced.

generate-structures.description: Allow the server to generate structures.

level-type.description: Determines the type of map that is generated.

enable-status.description: Makes the server appear as 'online' on the server list. If set to false, it will suppress replies from clients. This means it will appear as offline, but will still accept connections.
